scripts.build_: tsc  &&  cp package.json dist/ &&  cp -r ca dist/ && cp -r ressource dist/ && cp -r services dist/ && cp -r lb dist/ && cp -r admin dist/ && cp -r spc dist/ && cp -r search dist/ && cp  -r catalog dist/ && cp -r echo dist/ && cp -r event dist/ && cp -r file dist/ && cp -r ldap dist/ && cp -r monitoring dist/ && cp -r persistence dist/ && cp -r plc dist/ && cp -r plc_link dist/ && cp -r mail dist/ && cp -r mail dist/ && cp -r sql dist/ && cp -r storage dist/
scripts.version: npm run format && git add -A src
